```{r 1st chunk, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r 2nd chunk, message = FALSE}
nancy_data <- function(data = contributions, name_arg) {
  data %>%
    filter(cand_id == name_arg) %>%
    group_by(entity_type, transaction_amt) %>%
    summarize(total = n()) %>%
    arrange(desc(transaction_amt)) %>%
    head(20)
}

```

```{r 3rd chunk, message = FALSE}
nancy_plot <- ggplot(data = nancy_data("H8CA05035"), aes(x = entity_type, y = transaction_amt)) +
  geom_bar()

nancy_plot
```
